solution_line_template: She spent {num_bell_peppers} x ${bell_pepper_cost_each} = $<<{num_bell_peppers}*{bell_pepper_cost_each}={total_bell_pepper_cost}>>{total_bell_pepper_cost} for the four bell peppers.
She spent {meat_pounds} x ${meat_cost_per_pound} = $<<{meat_pounds}*{meat_cost_per_pound}={total_meat_cost}>>{total_meat_cost} for the 2 pounds of meat.
